trans-unit.source: Defines the SOAP fault codes that appear in a SOAP message when an error occurs while communicating with XML Web services using the SOAP version 1.2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i codici di errore SOAP che vengono visualizzati in un messaggio SOAP quando si verifica un errore durante la comunicazione con servizi Web XML mediante il protocollo SOAP versione 1.2.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP fault in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Un errore SOAP nella versione 1.2 della specifica SOAP contiene un `Code` elemento e tra gli altri un facoltativo `Subcode` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element is one of a pre-defined set of codes, informing a recipient that the cause of the error fell into one of five large error categories.
trans-unit.target: Il `Code` elemento fa parte di un set predefinito di codici, indicante un destinatario che la causa dell'errore rientrata in uno dei cinque ampie categorie di errore.

trans-unit.source: Those five fault codes are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: Questi codici di cinque errore sono rappresentati di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode>campi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: The `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application-specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Il `Subcode` elemento consente al mittente dell'errore SOAP di fornire un codice di errore specifico dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET defines two such codes that are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET definisce due codici rappresentati dal <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode>campi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service throwing an exception sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property, which represents the `Code` element, when a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Un servizio Web XML, generare un'eccezione di set di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà che rappresenta il `Code` elemento, quando una nuova istanza del <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>classe viene creata.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: That error is transmitted over the wire as a SOAP fault, which a .NET Framework client can catch as a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.
trans-unit.target: Tale errore viene trasmesso in rete come un errore SOAP, che è in grado di rilevare un client di .NET Framework come <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataEncodingUnknown" name="DataEncodingUnknown" href=""></xref> fault code indicating the SOAP message is encoded in an unrecognized format.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataEncodingUnknown" name="DataEncodingUnknown" href=""> </xref> codice di errore che indica che il messaggio SOAP è codificato in un formato non riconosciuto.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET non viene generato automaticamente un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è impostata su DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the fault code for missing ID in SOAP encoding data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il codice di errore per ID mancante nei dati di codifica SOAP.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_enc:UntypedValue" name="enc:UntypedValue" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating that the SOAP message was RPC-encoded and the type name property of an encoded graph node was not specified.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_enc:UntypedValue" name="enc:UntypedValue" href=""> </xref> sottocodice di errore indicante che il messaggio SOAP è stato codificato RPC e la proprietà nome tipo di un nodo grafico codificato non è stata specificata.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET non viene generato automaticamente un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe dispone di un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>proprietà di tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>che rappresenta il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta l'URI per il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP effettivo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode, impostare la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> fault code indicating a SOAP header marked with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> attribute was not processed.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> codice di errore che indica un'intestazione SOAP è contrassegnato con il <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> attributo non è stato elaborato.

trans-unit.source: Not all SOAP headers require processing by the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Non tutte le intestazioni SOAP richiedono l'elaborazione da parte del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: However, if a SOAP header is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to "true", processing is required.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se un'intestazione SOAP è contrassegnata con il `MustUnderstand` attributo uguale a "true", elaborazione è obbligatorio.

trans-unit.source: Failure to process the header when it resides within a SOAP 1.2 request generates a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to MustUnderstandFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: Errore di elaborazione dell'intestazione quando si trova all'interno di una richiesta SOAP 1.2 genera un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è impostata su MustUnderstandFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>

trans-unit.source: If the SOAP request resided within a SOAP 1.1 request, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se la richiesta SOAP si trova all'interno di una richiesta SOAP 1.1, la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault codes differing only by the version of the SOAP protocol used to send the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Sia SOAP 1.1 e 1.2 definiscono `MustUnderstand` codici di errore SOAP che differiscono solo per la versione del protocollo SOAP utilizzata per inviare il messaggio SOAP.

trans-unit.source: This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, and the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo rappresenta la versione di SOAP 1.2 e la versione di SOAP 1.1 è rappresentata da <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either one of the fault codes by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I due campi mappano a differenti nomi completi, ma è possibile verificare se il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è uno dei codici di errore chiamando il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Receiver" name="Receiver" href=""></xref> fault code indicating an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server due to a problem with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Receiver" name="Receiver" href=""> </xref> codice di errore che indica un errore durante l'elaborazione di una chiamata del client sul server a causa di un problema con il destinatario.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to ReceiverFaultCode when a server is called and it could not respond to a request due to network problems.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>viene generata un'eccezione con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è impostata su ReceiverFaultCode quando viene chiamato un server e non può rispondere a una richiesta a causa di problemi di rete.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Typically, with this type of exception, the client call may succeed later.
trans-unit.target: In genere, con questo tipo di eccezione, la chiamata del client può essere completata in un secondo momento.

trans-unit.source: The `Receiver` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Server` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode> field, but the `Server` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Il `Receiver` è simile al codice di errore SOAP di `Server` rappresentato dal codice di errore di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode>campo, ma la `Server` codice di errore viene utilizzato quando la richiesta SOAP viene inviata tramite SOAP 1.1.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Receiver` or `Server` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per verificare se il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>la proprietà di `Receiver` o `Server` codici di errore SOAP, chiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:BadArguments" name="rpc:BadArguments" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating that arguments sent to the XML Web service method were incorrect or could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:BadArguments" name="rpc:BadArguments" href=""> </xref> sottocodice di errore indicante che argomenti inviati al metodo del servizio Web XML non sono corrette o non è stato possibile analizzare.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET non viene generato automaticamente un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe dispone di un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>proprietà di tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>che rappresenta il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta l'URI per il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP effettivo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode, impostare la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" name="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating the XML Web service does not support the requested XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" name="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" href=""> </xref> codice secondario di errore indicante che il servizio Web XML non supporta il metodo di servizio Web XML richiesto.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET non viene generato automaticamente un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe dispone di un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>proprietà di tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>che rappresenta il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta l'URI per il codice secondario dell'errore SOAP effettivo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà su RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode, impostare la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sender" name="Sender" href=""></xref> fault code indicating a client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sender" name="Sender" href=""> </xref> codice di errore che indica che una chiamata del client non è stato formattato correttamente o non contiene le informazioni appropriate.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to SenderFaultCode when a SOAP 1.2 request is malformed or a parameter is missing.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>viene generata un'eccezione con il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>proprietà è impostata su SenderFaultCode quando una richiesta SOAP 1.2 non è valida o manca un parametro.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The `Sender` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Client` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode> field, but the `Client` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Il `Sender` è simile al codice di errore SOAP di `Client` rappresentato dal codice di errore di <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode>campo, ma la `Client` codice di errore viene utilizzato quando la richiesta SOAP viene inviata tramite SOAP 1.1.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Sender` or `Client` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per verificare se il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>la proprietà di `Sender` o `Client` codici di errore SOAP, chiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_VersionMismatch" name="VersionMismatch" href=""></xref> fault code indicating the XML Web service expected SOAP messages conforming to the SOAP 1.2 specification, yet received one conforming to SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il versione 1.2 di SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_VersionMismatch" name="VersionMismatch" href=""> </xref> codice di errore indicante che il servizio Web XML previsto i messaggi SOAP conformi alla specifica SOAP 1.2, ma ha ricevuto un messaggio conforme a SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
